segments.text: I've been working hard for a whole year . I really need a break .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . You need to take some time off to relax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said it . I'm looking forward to my annual vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When are you going to take your vacation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Later this month . I can't wait !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really envy you . You know I'm not taking my vacation until December .
segments.speaker: S2
